sentences.sContent: However, scientists do not believe that the new gelatin product would pose any risk.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, scientists do not believe that the new gelatin product would pose any risk.
sentences.sCn: 然而，科学家们并不认为这种新的明胶产品会带来任何风险。

sentences.sContent: Vegans avoid eating any animal products. They don't eat any meat products, milk, cheese, eggs, honey, or gelatin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Vegans avoid eating any animal products. They don't eat any meat products, milk, cheese, eggs, honey, or gelatin.
sentences.sCn: 绝对素食主义者不吃任何畜产品，不吃肉制品，牛奶，乳酪，蛋类，蜂蜜，或者是动物胶。

synos.tran: [有化][胶粘]明胶；动物胶；胶制品

words.tran: 去势的人或牲畜；阉割的动物；去势；太监

trans.tranOther: a clear substance obtained from boiled animal bones, used for making jelly
